Vampirtron: 
     "I-I-I," He stammered (driving that home aren't I?), "I don't quite know." He transformed to robot mode and sat down on the table. "The Hunger is gone. I can still feel it in me, buring a little." 
     He looked Kenzo in the eyes, "I want you to run a complete diagnostic scan of me, whatever you think you need to run, and then some, I want to know all about myself." 
Catmastero, this means I'm giving you permission to move Vampirtron where you need him to go, if you need him across the room, just be like "hey, now your there" That way this goes alot faster than having to wait for the posting. 
 catmastero wrote: "Are you...okay?" Kenzo asked changing his finger back to normal.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "thevmprlestat2000" <thevmprlestat2000@y...> wrote:
> (sorry it took so long)
> 
> Vampirtron:
> 
>      He moved slowly towards the door, always looking at Kenzo, when 
> he go to the door it whoshed open. He growled again, red eyes 
> blazing, when they faded, when his eyes lit up again they were 
> their "natural" blue. 
>      "Thank the Matrix," He said, and colapsed in a heap.
